revised_title: Fracture Mechanics in Design and Service: Enhancing Safety in Nuclear Plants
tldr: This article discusses the application of fracture mechanics in the design and service of nuclear plants. It highlights the importance of understanding and managing defects, periodic in-service inspections, and using fracture mechanics to assess the safety and reliability of nuclear vessels. The study focuses on the use of fracture mechanics in the United States, specifically in the American Society of Mechanical Engineers' Boiler and Pressure Vessel Codes.
scientific_discipline: Engineering and Technology > Materials Science and Engineering
